alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Graves; Marshall; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 12:19PM EST until March 03 at 12:45PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CST FOR EASTERN MASSAC...CALLOWAY...WESTERN MARSHALL...EASTERN MCCRACKEN AND EASTERN GRAVES COUNTIES... At 1119 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located over mainly rural from about 6 miles south of Murray to just east of Metropolis, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Paducah, Murray, Mayfield, Metropolis, Benton, Reidland, Lone Oak, Brookport, Lynnville, Hardin, Hazel, New Concord, Kirksey, Brewers, Harris Grove and Symsonia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 24. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 32 and 38. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 27 and 49. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for southern Illinois...and western Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
